Privacy Policy

Commitment to Privacy-First Architecture

1. General Information

The protection of your personal data is a high priority for us. This Privacy Policy informs you about how we handle data when you visit our website. As we aim for a "privacy-first" approach, we collect as little data as possible.

2. Data Collection on our Website

Cookies:

This website does not use tracking or marketing cookies. We only use essential technical cookies if they are strictly necessary for the website's functionality.

Comments & Accounts:

We do not offer user accounts or comment sections, so no personal data is stored in this regard.

3. Server Log Files

Our hosting provider (netcup GmbH) automatically collects and stores information in so-called server log files, which your browser automatically transmits to us:

  • ðŸ”¹ Browser type and version
  • ðŸ”¹ Operating system used
  • ðŸ”¹ Referrer URL
  • ðŸ”¹ Host name of computer
  • ðŸ”¹ Time of the server request
  • ðŸ”¹ IP address

This data is required for technical reasons to ensure a stable and secure connection. Legal basis: Art. 6 (1) (f) GDPR.

4. ISO Downloads

When you download a VeloxOS ISO file, the server may log the IP address and timestamp to ensure the integrity of our download mirrors and to prevent abuse. This data is not used to create personal user profiles.

5. Your Rights

You have the right to request information about your stored data at any time. You also have the right to request the correction, blocking, or deletion of this data. If you have questions, please reach out via the contact details in the imprint.
